text: “allah pahala kala meya, oba visvasa karanu” yayi ovunta kiyanu læbuvahot “apage (nabivarun) veta pahala karanu læbu dæya (pamanak) visvasa karamu” yayi pavasa eva misa, meya (mema dharmaya) pratiksepa kara harinnaha. namut meya nam, ovun veta æti dæya (tavrataya) satyaya kara tabana satya (dharmaya) vasayen ætteya. (nabiye! ovunta) oba mese kiyanu: “(obage dharmayama) ættenma oba visvasa kalavun vasayen sitinne nam, (obagen ikut vu) allahge nabivarunva mita pera oba kumak nisa ghatanaya kalehuda?”
